title: Magic - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/5/19
itunes:title: Magic - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/5/19
description:
George Noory and author Jason Louv explore his work with spirituality and magic, famous people who have been interested in the occult, and how magic practices and religion can work together to make the world better for everyone.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
